item.title: About
item.description: Peer-Reviewed Articles Siew, C. S. Q., Pelczarski, K., Yaruss, J. S., & Vitevitch, M. S. (2017). Using the OASES-A to illustrate how network analysis can be applied to understand the experience of stuttering. Journal of Communication Disorders, 65, 1-9. (Link) Siew, C. S. Q. (2017). The influence of 2-hop network density on spoken word recognition. Psychonomic Bulletin and Review, 24(2), 496-502. (Full-Text Link) (KU ScholarWorks) Vitevitch, M. S. & Siew, C.
